DOC.brief_summary: This observational , exploratory study design collect ( record ) analyze normal abnormal sound data human bladder surgery use novel sensor-based catheter system ( Electronic Catheter Stethoscope ) develop algorithms detect change baseline bladder ureteral function . The Electronic Catheter Stethoscope device measure acoustic pressure data within bladder . The measurement use detect leakage bladder and/or change baseline ureteral flow correlation sound data surgical data report surgeon . These data use develop algorithms detect change baseline bladder ureteral function . The algorithm test future clinical trial .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria age 18 old plan one follow type surgery : laparoscopic abdominal gynecological surgery vaginal surgery able provide write informed consent Exclusion Criteria 18 year age bilateral tubal ligation single reason surgery current pregnancy unable provide write informed consent
